issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce
1. Create a default Titanium Studio project
2. Replace the resources folder with the one attached
3. Open ddms or logcat
4. Run the app and press the table view touchend row

Actual result:
No touchend events are fired

Expected result:
A touchend event is fired
fields.summary: Android : Table View - v8, rhino - After pressing a table view row, no touchend event if fired
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120212011634, 1.8.1
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPhone 4S OS 5.0.1

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue will not fix and with reference to the above comments.
